name: Detective Montgomery Fox: The Revenge of Victor Draven
name_original: Detective Montgomery Fox: The Revenge of Victor Draven
description:
For the police, it's an easy case because the surveillance camera recorded the identity of the thief very "accurately". Funny thing is - at the time of the robbery, he was in another city. Unfortunately, not even a single witness can confirm this. And a thief who is not a thief really has a serious problem ahead of him.



Join this "thief" in his quest to prove his innocence. Will he succeed? Will he unravel the mystery of the "Man with a Thousand Faces"? Will he be able to determine the identity of the mysterious painter? And will he manage to prove that Victor Draven is behind everything? In the end, will he remain free or will he face a long prison sentence? Find out in this colorful and relaxing hidden object adventure game!

You guessed right. The picture was stolen by none other than Detective Montgomery Fox!

Play it by yourself or with your kids, this game makes a perfect choice for every hidden object fan.



  • CONTINUE the adventure and help Detective Fox with his new case
  • DOZENS of unique locations with HUNDREDS of HIDDEN ITEMS waiting to be found
  • SEARCH for clues and prove your innocence
  • INVESTIGATE the city and various locations and levels
  • MEET different characters who will help (or not?) your case
  • SOLVE mini-games and puzzles such as find the difference, jigsaw, memory and more
  • FIND items in different search modes like: random text, inverted names, silhouettes and more
  • WIN ACHIEVEMENTS and STARS on each level
  • ZOOM on scenes for easier object-finding
  • BEAUTIFUL bright and colorful graphics
  • DIFFICULTY MODES of your choice: play relaxed or challenge
  • SUITABLE for young audience
